00007 #define CUPP_cupp_runtime_H

00010 #error Not compatible with CUDA. Don't compile with nvcc.
00011 #endif
00012 
00013 // CUPP
00014 #include "cupp_common.h"
00015 #include "exception/cuda_runtime_error.h"
00016 
00017 // CUDA
00018 #include <cuda_runtime.h>
00019 
00020 
00021 namespace cupp {
00022 
00023 template< typename T > class shared_device_pointer; // forward declaration to break cycle dependency
00024 
00025 template <typename T>
00026 void mem_set(T* device_pointer, int value, const size_t size=1) {
00027         if (cudaMemset( reinterpret_cast<void*>( device_pointer ), value, sizeof(T)*size ) != cudaSuccess) {
00028                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00029         }
00030 }
00031 
00032 template <typename T>
00033 void mem_set(shared_device_pointer<T> device_pointer, int value, const size_t size=1) {
00034         mem_set(device_pointer.get(), value, size);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void* malloc_ (const unsigned int size_in_b) {
00038         void* temp;
00039         if (cudaMalloc( &temp, size_in_b ) != cudaSuccess) {
00040                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00041         }
00042         return temp;
00043 }
00044 
00045 template <typename T>
00046 T* malloc(const size_t size=1) {
00047         return static_cast<T*> (malloc_ (size*sizeof(T)));
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 template <typename T>
00052 void free(T* device_pointer) {
00053         if (cudaFree(device_pointer) != cudaSuccess) {
00054                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 template <typename T>
00060 void copy_host_to_device(T *destination, const T * const source, size_t count=1) {
00061         if ( cudaMemcpy(destination, source, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00062                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 template <typename T>
00068 void copy_host_to_device(shared_device_pointer<T> destination, const T * const source, size_t count=1) {
00069         copy_host_to_device(destination.get(), source, count);
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 template <typename T>
00074 void copy_device_to_device(T* destination, const T * const source, size_t count=1) {
00075         if ( cudaMemcpy(destination, source, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00076                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00077         }
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 template <typename T>
00082 void copy_device_to_device(shared_device_pointer<T> destination, const T * const source, size_t count=1) {
00083         copy_device_to_device (destination.get(), source, count);
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 template <typename T>
00088 void copy_device_to_device(T *destination, const shared_device_pointer<T> source, size_t count=1) {
00089         copy_device_to_device (destination, source.get(), count);
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 template <typename T>
00094 void copy_device_to_device(shared_device_pointer<T> destination, const shared_device_pointer<T> source, size_t count=1) {
00095         copy_device_to_device (destination.get(), source.get(), count);
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 template <typename T>
00100 void copy_device_to_host(T* destination, const T * const source, size_t count=1) {
00101         if (cudaMemcpy(destination, source, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00102                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00103         }
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 template <typename T>
00108 void copy_device_to_host(T* destination, const shared_device_pointer<T> source, size_t count=1) {
00109         if (cudaMemcpy(destination, source.get(), count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00110                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00111         }
00112 }
00113 
00117 void thread_synchronize() {
00118         if (cudaThreadSynchronize() != cudaSuccess) {
00119                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00120         }
00121 }
